member.name: M:FarPoint.Win.Spread.Design.DesignerMain.AddChart(System.Type,FarPoint.Win.Chart.ChartViewType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a chart to the SheetView. The chart data comes from the current selection in the SheetView. If there is no selection, the data comes from the active cell. If there is only one selection, the chart is created from that selection. If there are many selections, the chart is created from all the selections. The chart is aligned in the center of the SheetView.
member.param: Indicates which chart type will be added.
if set to true the new chart will have a default legend area. Otherwise, there is no legend area.
member.remarks: The current selection will be cleared after this function is called.
